Do You Still Love Me Like You Used To? BEST COAST

G I wake up to the morning sun, Em Em X When did my life stop being so fun? G Wish I could care about someone, the way I used to. Em Em X When will this be done?

G I’m always crying on the phone, Em Em X Because I know that I’ll end up alone. G Lord please forgive me for my sins Em Em X I didn’t mean it, I just want it to end

G Do you love me like you used to? Em Do you, do you, do you?

G I have no reason to complain, Em Em X My feelings change, they melt away in my brain. G I keep myself awake at night, Em Em X Sleep with the lights on, always ready to fire
